Package edu.rpi.legup.controller

package edu.rpi.legup.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.rpi.legup
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BoardController
     
    Controller
    Controller is an abstract class designed to handle various mouse events and provide control functionality for a ScrollView.
    CursorController
    CursorController provides functionality for managing the cursor appearance during actions that take a certain amount of time.
    EditorElementController
    EditorElementController manages actions related to UI elements within the puzzle editor environment.
    ElementController
    The ElementController class manages UI interactions related to elements in a BoardView.
    RuleController
    The RuleController class is responsible for handling UI events related to rule buttons in the RulePanel of the Legup application.
    ToolbarController
     
    TreeController
    The TreeController class handles UI events from a TreePanel.
